name: Traditional Cypress Christmas tree - approx 1.5 to 1.75 metres tall
description:
We are very very sorry but we have sold out of trees for the year.  Please email us and we will put you in the mailing list for next Christmas so you wont miss out a second year.

Have a lovely Christmas and thanks for your support!



Standing approximately 1.5 to 1.75 meters tall The Leighton Green - Cypress is our Traditional Christmas tree. 

Every tree is unique with a whimsical shape, tall with long branches to hold all your decorations, it will provide a subtle cypress smell without the dropped needles. 

Each year the trees height and foliage depends on the growing year.   This year they are not as thick as the first photo below but still have many branches to hang all your decorations. 

The tree comes wrapped in hessian and with a saucer base, to protect your floor as you look after the tree (height includes the pot)

DO NOT FORGET TO SELECT YOUR DELIVERY PRODUCT

name: Native Australian Christmas Tree - 60cm high
description:
You cant really get any more eco friendly than an Australian Native Christmas Tree.

The Albany Woollybush is our Native tree again this year and whilst it is compact it provides lots of space for decorations. (NOTE: will not support heavy ornaments)

The leave are soft and need gentle care when decorating.

The tree stands between 60 cm and 70 cm metre and comes wrapped in hessian with a saucer. (height includes the pot)

DO NOT FORGET TO SELECT YOUR DELIVERY PRODUCT

Note: Height is measured from the base of the pot.

name: Medium Spruce Christmas Tree - Norway Spruce - 100 cm tall
description:
Sorry we are sold out of Medium Spruce for this year.
 
Also in our range again this year is the Norway Spruce or Picea abies. The perfect European Christmas tree look

They are gorgeous this year, full and tall - just on a metre high.

Perfect if you need a smaller tree option for those who lack the room for a Traditional sized tree but want to make an impact! 

The tree comes wrapped in hessian and includes a saucer.

DON'T FORGET TO CHOOSE YOUR DELIVERY OPTION

Note: Height is measured from the base of the pot.

name: Medium Pine Christmas Tree - Christmas Star - 60-70 cm tall - Buy or rent
description:
Sorry we are sold out of medium pines for this year. 

An option for a medium sized Christmas tree is the Christmas star or Picea glauca - or commonly known around Christmas as the "Christmas Star".

A perfect centre piece for your table as an additional decoration for Christmas or a smaller tree for those who lack the room but want the real thing!

The tree comes wrapped in hessian and includes a saucer.

Note: Height is measured from the base of the pot.

We also have smaller versions of this tree for cute individual trees for kids rooms, or anywhere else in the house.

DONT FORGET TO SELECT YOUR DELIVERY OPTION

name: Mini Christmas Trees - Buy only - 30-40 cm high - perfect for children's rooms!
description:
No room? then try the mini Christmas tree option. How about having a mini Christmas trees in your child's room...

The "Christmas Star" or Picea glauca is approx 30 centimeters tall including the pot. It comes in a red plastic pot and is easy to take care of.  You can keep and repot for next Christmas or put into your garden.

Perfect for gifts, spare rooms or as your actual tree for those who are challenged in the space department.

Buy it or rent it - either way there is no excuse now to not have a living Christmas tree.

DONT FORGET TO CHOOSE YOUR DELIVERY OPTION

Note: Height is measured from the base of the pot.

name: Large - Traditional Christmas Tree - Cypress 2 + metres tall
description:
This is tree is the older sibling of our Traditional Christmas tree - but note this year they are tall!  over 2.5 even 3 metres to their tip. (note the tip will bend over easily for you to fit it into your room.

Every tree is unique with a whimsical shape, tall with long branches to hold all your decorations, it will provide a subtle cypress smell without the dropped needles.

The tree comes wrapped in hessian and with a saucer base, to protect your floor as you look after the tree (height includes the pot)

I am sorry i don't have any photos if this tree yet.

DO NOT FORGET TO SELECT YOUR DELIVERY PRODUCT

name: Standard Delivery - Select if you have a safe place to leave the tree
description:
The easiest way for us to deliver and collect your tree is to leave it somewhere safe on your property.

This delivery and collection is included in the price of your tree (see note below), all you need to do is select this product and we will know to leave the tree at the address you leave on the order.

There are a range of delivery and collection windows available.  Please select the appropriate option from the list below.  

We deliver during a weeks window and collect generally on the first or second day of that week.


Delivery windows

Week 1 finished
Week 2 – 8th to 14th December
Week 3 – 15th to 20th December
Week 4 – Deliveries 21st December to Christmas eve on request only

Collection

First week of January collection available on request
7th and 8th January
11th and 12th January
Collection after these dates is available on request

Please select this product and add it to your order.  

NOTE: This delivery is for Metro MELBOURNE, plus restricted delivery dates for Geelong and the Surf Coast only.  Delivery is available for other locations but may include an additional charge.  Please email us to discuss.

name: Premium Delivery and Collection
description:
Premium delivery and collection is required when you do not have a safe place where the tree can be left for delivery and for collection.

This means that you need to make an appointment for our Team to meet you. 

This can be at anytime that suits you even evenings and weekends.

Make sure you leave your phone number and we will call you to arrange the appointment time.

If you are unsure please do not hesitate to call us on 0432 374 812 or email us on info@ecochristmastrees.com.au

name: Upgrade to Buy
description:
Love your tree!  Then we would love you to keep it.

Select this product and the tree is yours to keep.
